title: GHQ 12 vs IRI

date: 2025-01-26
---

## GHQ 12 vs IRI

Harmony was developed precisely for scenarios such as the comparison between GHQ 12 and IRI. For psychologists and social scientists, it's essential to match items accurately across different questionnaires for cohesive study results. Harmony uses natural language processing and generative AI to harmonise questionnaire items from the GHQ 12 and IRI or any other questionnaires, sometimes even across different languages. The process of harmonisation is often tedious and time-consuming, making Harmony an invaluable tool for researchers. The GHQ 12 (General Health Questionnaire) and the IRI (Interpersonal Reactivity Index) both assess mental health aspects, but their compatibility could be hard to determine manually. Using Harmony to evaluate GHQ 12 vs IRI would save time, increase accuracy, and streamline the study process. Harmony boasts an extensive database of instruments and also allows for the input of unique or customized questionnaires. The ease of comparing GHQ 12 vs IRI with Harmony makes it an ideal software solution for the modern social scientist. By employing large language models, Harmony can analyze the connection between each item in the GHQ 12 and IRI and provide a percentage match. This feature makes it easier and more efficient to compare and contrast results from different studies. Visit Harmony's platform today and witness how GHQ 12 vs IRI comparisons can be simplified to a few clicks.
